name: Simulink
longDescription: Run arbitrary live simulations using Simulink via MATLAB engine for .NET

Variables.Name: INPUT_TOPIC
Variables.Description: This is the input topic where to read data in

Variables.Name: OUTPUT_TOPIC
Variables.Description: This is the output topic where to write data out

Variables.Name: MLM_LICENSE_FILE
Variables.Description: License server port and address. E.g., 27000@hostname_or_ip_addr
